title: There are people who say god exists and there are many who deny it ,who is correct? - Quora

response.answer_text: For those who have no clue of what God is..they deny or accept it out of ignorance of God.. When primal truth is realised, there is an absolute clarity that ever illuminated awareness alone is..and whole creation incl all religions r a mere dream within it..
God is all http://pervasive.It is for us to feel his presence.Even Adi Sankaracharya said that he can not describe the exact form of God.God is an Invisible Force that is present every where.
